otherNames: Zhan Yue, Moon Chopping, Moon Slayer, Reborn as a Skeleton, Zhǎn Yuè, 斩月, 血月の死神〜最強のボスを目指して〜
synopsis: After becoming a boss in the game, I began hiding within the players whilst uncovering the secrets of the game world. In order to become the only king, I have decided to resort to every conceivable means to change this world. Guilds? Players? Bosses? They are all stepping stones to achieve my goal. I will be slaying everything “Illusory Moon” has brought upon the world.
